org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status

Class IndexStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.status.IndexStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<IndexShardStatus>
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class IndexStatus
extends Object
implements Iterable<IndexShardStatus>
    This class will be removed in future versions Use the recovery API instead
